--- select_singer_with_single_column_subquery_with_at.sql
SELECT (
  SELECT FirstName
  FROM Singers LIMIT 100
) AS FN

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      60,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  7,
        end:  60,
        Expr: &parser.SubQuery{
          pos:  7,
          end:  54,
          Expr: &parser.Select{
            pos:      11,
            end:      52,
            Distinct: false,
            AsStruct: false,
            List:     parser.SelectExprList{
              &parser.SelectExpr{
                pos:  18,
                end:  27,
                Expr: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  18,
                  end:  27,
                  Name: "FirstName",
                },
                Star: false,
                As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
              },
            },
            From: parser.FromItemList{
              &parser.FromItem{
                end:  42,
                Expr: &parser.TableName{
                  end:   42,
                  Ident: &parser.Ident{
                    pos:  35,
                    end:  42,
                    Name: "Singers",
                  },
                  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
                  As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
                },
                Method: "",
                Num:    nil,
                Rows:   false,
              },
            },
            Where:   nil,
            GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
            Having:  nil,
            OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
            Limit:   &parser.Limit{
              Count: &parser.IntLit{
                pos:   49,
                end:   52,
                Value: "100",
              },
              Offset: nil,
            },
          },
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   &parser.Ident{
          pos:  58,
          end:  60,
          Name: "FN",
        },
      },
    },
    From:    parser.FromItemList{},
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT (SELECT FirstName FROM Singers LIMIT 100) AS FN
